document.docAuthor: El-Hawagry, Magdi S. & Al Dhafer, Hathal M.
document.masterDocTitle: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Exoprosopa
Macquart, 1840 : 35
. Type species:
Anthrax pandora Fabricius, 1805
, by subsequent designation of
Coquillett, 1910 : 544
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Hosts: Larvae and cocoons of Sphecidae , Pompilidae , Tiphiidae and Scarabaeidae ( Hull 1973 ; Yeates & Greathead 1997 ).

Exoprosopa asiris Greathead, 1980
( Fig. 14 )

Exoprosopa asiris Greathead, 1980b: 334
. Type locality: Yemen .
Distribution: AF: Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Yemen .
Saudi Arabian localities: Asir : Raydah Protected Area (Abha Gov.).
Dates of collection: May to November.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax biguttata
Macquart, 1834 : 409
. Type locality: Cape Verde Island.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Benin , Cape Verde Island, Chad , Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Eritrea , Ethiopia , Ghana , Ivory Coast , Mali , Mauritania , Niger , Nigeria , Oman , Senegal , Sudan . PA: Egypt , Saudi Arabia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Makkah : Rabegh (Rabegh Gov.).
Dates of collection: April.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax decrepita
Wiedemann, 1828 : 564
. Type locality: Egypt or Sudan [as “Nubien”].

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Chad , Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Senegal , Sudan . PA: Egypt , Israel , Saudi Arabia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Riyadh : Al-Ghat (Al-Ghat Gov.).
Dates of collection: August.

Exoprosopa disrupta tihamae Greathead, 1980
Exoprosopa disrupta tihamae Greathead, 1980a: 246
. Type locality: Yemen . Distribution: AF: Oman , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], United Arab Emirates . Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha: Jabal Shada Al A’Ala Protected Area (Al-Mekhwa Gov.), Ghabet Raghdan (Al-
Baha Gov.), Ghabet Shahba ( Al-Baha Gov.). Asir : Fayfa (Fayfa Gov.), Muhaiel City (Muhaiel Gov.), Raydah
Protected Area (Abha Gov.). Jazan : Abu-Arish (Abu-Arish Gov.), Jazan City ( Jazan Gov.). Makkah : Taief
escarpment (Taief Gov.), Wadi Majarish ( Makkah Gov.). Dates of collection: Throughout the year.

bibRefCitation.author: Bezzi, M.
bibRefCitation.refString: Bezzi, M. (1925) Quelques notes sur les bombyliides (Dipt.) d'Egypte, avec description d'especes nouvelles. Bulletin de la Societe Royal d'Entomologique d'Egypte, 8, 159 - 242.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Exoprosopa efflatouni
Bezzi, 1925 : 240
. Type locality: Egypt (Marg, Wadi Hoff).

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Eritrea , Mali , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Sudan , Yemen . OR: India ( Maharashtra ), Pakistan . PA: Algeria , Egypt , Iran , Israel .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Al-Mekhwa City (Al-Mekhwa Gov.). Asir : Muhaiel City (Muhaiel Gov.). Jazan : Abu-Arish (Abu-Arish Gov.).
Dates of collection: March to May.

Exoprosopa eritreae Greathead, 1967
Exoprosopa eritreae Greathead, 1967 : 274
. Type locality: Eritrea . Distribution: AF: Chad , Eritrea , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Somalia . Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha: Al-Mekhwa City (Al-Mekhwa Gov.). Asir: nr. Abha (Abha Gov.), Fayfa (Fayfa
Gov.), Khamis Al-Bahr (Muhaiel Gov.). Jazan : Shuqayq ( Jazan Gov.). Makkah : Jabal Daka, Taief escarpment
(Taief Gov.). Dates of collection: April to December.

bibRefCitation.author: Bezzi, M.
bibRefCitation.refString: Bezzi, M. (1924) The Bombyliidae of the Ethiopian Region. British Museum (Natural History), London, 390 pp.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Exoprosopa linearis
Bezzi, 1924 : 339
. Type locality: Yemen .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Eritrea , Oman , Saudi Arabia [as South-western part], Yemen .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Al-Mekhwa City (Al-Mekhwa Gov.).
Dates of collection: March.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax nemesis
Fabricius, 1805 : 121
. Type locality: Guinea .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Botswana , Congo , Ethiopia , Kenya , Namibia , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], South Africa ( Eastern Cape , Western Cape ), Swaziland , Tanzania , Zambia , Zimbabwe .
Saudi Arabian localities: Asir : nr. Muhaiel City (Muhaiel Gov.).
Dates of collection: December.

bibRefCitation.author: Paramonov, S. J.
bibRefCitation.refString: Paramonov, S. J. (1928) Beitrage zur Monographie der Gattung Exoprosopa. Trudy Fizichno-Matematichnoho Viddilu Ukrains'ka Akademiia Nauk, 6 (2), 181 - 303.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Exoprosopa pharaonis
Paramonov, 1928 : 260
(82).
Type locality: Egypt
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Mali , Oman , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Sudan . PA: Egypt , Saudi Arabia , Tunisia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Al-Mekhwa City (Al-Mekhwa Gov.). Riyadh : Rawdhat Khorim (Rimah Gov.).
Dates of collection: March to June.

bibRefCitation.author: Macquart, P. J. M.
bibRefCitation.refString: Macquart, P. J. M. (1840) Dipteres exotiques nouveaux ou peu connus. Tome Premier. 1 re Partie. N. E. Roret, Paris, 131 pp.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Exoprosopa pusilla
Macquart, 1840 : 46
[1841: 324]. Type locality: “ Sénégal ” [= Gambia or Senegal ].

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Chad , Ethiopia , Gambia , Ghana , Guinea-Bissau , Ivory Coast , Kenya , Nigeria , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Senegal , Uganda , Yemen .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Al-Mekhwa City (Al-Mekhwa Gov.). Asir : Alaya (Bilqarn Gov.).
Dates of collection: March to June.
